sentence: This version of the USFL is not directly linked to the USFL that existed from 1983 to 1985 and managed to sign several marquee players who would eventually go on to star in the NFL, including Steve Young, Herschel Walker, Reggie White, Jim Kelly and Doug Flutie.
title: Jeff Fisher returns to pro football as a head coach in the fledgling USFL

sentence: Headlined by reigning Heisman Trophy winner Herschel Walker, the first USFL also played a spring schedule and remains the last league to give the NFL a run for its money.
title: As the USFL restarts, a look back at the Washington Federals wild ride

sentence: That predecessor launched the professional football careers of Heisman Trophy winners like Herschel Walker and Doug Flutie, and future Hall of Famers like Reggie White, Jim Kelly and Steve Young.
title: The U.S.F.L. Isnt Back. The U.S.F.L. Is Here.
